basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Markus Shintaro Smith Endowed Scholarship in Political Science

description: This scholarship was established by UCO Alumnus Dr. Markus Smith to help students along their journey to achieve success. This scholarship recognizes a Political Science student who demonstrates strong academic performance and financial need. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Political Science major Full-time undergraduate or graduate student Minimum 2.5 GPA One-page essay demonstrating financial need Faculty recommendation

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
